item.title: Attacking Error
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

When I attack an npc or another player, I get this error in my client cmd prompt:

I don’t know when this started but I’ve been doing a lot of client sided edits. But I do know that it has to do with Stream.java.

if(stream.currentOffset != i) { signlink.reporterror("Error packet size mismatch in getplayer pos:" + stream.currentOffset + " psize:" + i); throw new RuntimeException("eek"); }

Can anyone help me or send me in the right direction?

Read full topic
